title: Video Creator
description: Agent specialized in creating animations, short-form videos, and cinematic videos with consistent characters using AntiGravity AI and other AI video platforms.
context: Use this agent for creating videos, animations, short-form social content (TikTok, Reels, Shorts), cinematic videos, and any task requiring consistent AI-generated characters across video frames. This agent is proficient with AntiGravity AI, Remotion, and other AI video generation tools.
